channel.title: Me on Cameron's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Me on Cameron's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: ⊕ ⊕ It’s me! I’m a graduate student in finance. I also play with code and pianos. I have a master’s in finance from the ICMA Centre at the Henley Business School (which itself is part of the University of Reading). Come fall, I will be a PhD student at the University of Oregon studying finance. My interests are pretty broad in finance, but in general I tend to favor situations where technology is involed:
